verses.text: \w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w fifteenth|strong="G4003"\w* \w year|strong="G2094"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w reign|strong="G2231"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* Emperor \w Tiberius|strong="G5086"\w*, \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w Pontius|strong="G4194"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w governor|strong="G2230"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Judea|strong="G2449"\w*, \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w* ruler \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w his|strong="G1722"\w* brother \w Philip|strong="G5376"\w* ruler \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* territory comprising \w Ituraea|strong="G2484"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Trachonitis|strong="G5139"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lysanias|strong="G3078"\w* ruler \w of|strong="G2532"\w* Abilene,

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* Annas \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Caiaphas|strong="G2533"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w high|strong="G2532"\w* priests, \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w command|strong="G4487"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w Zechariah|strong="G2197"\w*, \w while|strong="G1722"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w wilderness|strong="G2048"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G2064"\w* through \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w whole|strong="G3956"\w* \w district|strong="G4066"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jordan|strong="G2446"\w*, \w proclaiming|strong="G2784"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* baptism \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w repentance|strong="G3341"\w*, \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* forgiveness \w of|strong="G2532"\w* sins.

\w This|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* fulfillment \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w said|strong="G3056"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* writings \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="G2268"\w* – ‘\w The|strong="G1722"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* crying aloud \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w wilderness|strong="G2048"\w*: “\w Make|strong="G4160"\w* \w ready|strong="G2090"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w way|strong="G3598"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \w his|strong="G1722"\w* \w paths|strong="G5147"\w* \w straight|strong="G2117"\w*.

\w Every|strong="G3956"\w* chasm \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w filled|strong="G4137"\w*, \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hill|strong="G3735"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* leveled. \w The|strong="G2532"\w* winding \w ways|strong="G3598"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* straightened, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w rough|strong="G5138"\w* \w roads|strong="G3598"\w* \w made|strong="G4137"\w* \w smooth|strong="G3006"\w*,

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w everyone|strong="G3956"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w see|strong="G3708"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4992"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.”’

\w And|strong="G3767"\w* \w John|strong="G3004"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w crowds|strong="G3793"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w went|strong="G1607"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w be|strong="G3195"\w* baptized \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, “\w You|strong="G5210"\w* children \w of|strong="G5259"\w* snakes! \w Who|strong="G5101"\w* \w has|strong="G5101"\w* prompted \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w seek|strong="G5101"\w* refuge \w from|strong="G5259"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w coming|strong="G3195"\w* judgment?

\w Let|strong="G1063"\w* \w your|strong="G2192"\w* lives, \w then|strong="G3767"\w*, prove \w your|strong="G2192"\w* \w repentance|strong="G3341"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* begin \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w* ‘Abraham \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w ancestor|strong="G3962"\w*,’ \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w tell|strong="G3004"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w stones|strong="G3037"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w able|strong="G1410"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w raise|strong="G1453"\w* \w descendants|strong="G2590"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* Abraham!

\w Already|strong="G2235"\w*, \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* axe \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w lying|strong="G2749"\w* \w at|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w root|strong="G4491"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w trees|strong="G1186"\w*. \w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w tree|strong="G1186"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* fails \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w bear|strong="G4160"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w fruit|strong="G2590"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w cut|strong="G1581"\w* \w down|strong="G1581"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* thrown \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*.”

“\w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w*?” \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w people|strong="G3793"\w* \w asked|strong="G1905"\w*.

“\w Let|strong="G1161"\w* anyone \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w has|strong="G2192"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w coats|strong="G5509"\w*,” \w answered|strong="G3004"\w* \w John|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w share|strong="G3330"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* person \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w has|strong="G2192"\w* \w none|strong="G3361"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* anyone \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w has|strong="G2192"\w* \w food|strong="G1033"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w same|strong="G3668"\w*.”

\w Even|strong="G2532"\w* \w tax|strong="G5057"\w* \w collectors|strong="G5057"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* baptized, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w John|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w Teacher|strong="G1320"\w*, \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w are|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w*?”

“\w Do|strong="G4238"\w* \w not|strong="G3367"\w* \w collect|strong="G4238"\w* \w more|strong="G4119"\w* \w than|strong="G3844"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w have|strong="G5210"\w* authority \w to|strong="G4314"\w* demand,” \w John|strong="G3004"\w* \w answered|strong="G3004"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w some|strong="G3588"\w* \w soldiers|strong="G4754"\w* \w on|strong="G1161"\w* \w active|strong="G4754"\w* \w service|strong="G4754"\w* \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* “\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* – \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w*?” \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w Never|strong="G3367"\w* \w use|strong="G3588"\w* violence, \w or|strong="G2532"\w* exact \w anything|strong="G3367"\w* \w by|strong="G4314"\w* false \w accusation|strong="G4811"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w content|strong="G4160"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* pay.”

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w*, \w while|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* suspense, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* debating \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1722"\w* \w whether|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w could|strong="G3588"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*,

\w John|strong="G2491"\w*, \w addressing|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w I|strong="G1473"\w*, \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w*, baptize \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w coming|strong="G2064"\w* \w one|strong="G3739"\w* \w more|strong="G2532"\w* \w powerful|strong="G2478"\w* \w than|strong="G2478"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w fit|strong="G2425"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* unfasten \w his|strong="G3956"\w* \w sandals|strong="G5266"\w*. \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* baptize \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Holy|strong="G4151"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*.

\w His|strong="G1519"\w* winnowing-fan \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w clear|strong="G1245"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* threshing-floor, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w store|strong="G4863"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w grain|strong="G4621"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* barn, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* chaff \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w burn|strong="G2618"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* cannot \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w put|strong="G2532"\w* \w out|strong="G2532"\w*.”

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G3767"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w different|strong="G2087"\w* appeals \w John|strong="G2097"\w* told \w his|strong="G2532"\w* \w good|strong="G2097"\w* \w news|strong="G2097"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w John|strong="G2532"\w* \w rebuked|strong="G1651"\w* \w Herod|strong="G2264"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* ruler, \w for|strong="G4012"\w* Herodia \w his|strong="G3956"\w* brother’s \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w evil|strong="G4190"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w done|strong="G4160"\w*,

Herod crowned \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* shutting \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w up|strong="G2623"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w prison|strong="G5438"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w after|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* baptism \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w been|strong="G1096"\w* baptized \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* still \w praying|strong="G4336"\w*, \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w* opened,

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Holy|strong="G4151"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w* \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w form|strong="G1491"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w dove|strong="G4058"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* – “\w You|strong="G4771"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w my|strong="G1722"\w* dearly loved \w son|strong="G5207"\w*; \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w bring|strong="G2532"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w great|strong="G2532"\w* joy.”

\w When|strong="G5613"\w* beginning \w his|strong="G2532"\w* work, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w about|strong="G5613"\w* \w thirty|strong="G5144"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w* \w old|strong="G2094"\w*. \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* regarded \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w*, \w whose|strong="G3588"\w* ancestors \w were|strong="G1510"\w* – \w Eli|strong="G2242"\w*,
